    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteAnimation

        public SpriteAnimation(graphics.Image image,
               int x,
               int y,
               int fps,
               int frameCount,
               int framesWide,
               int framesHigh,
               boolean looping,
               boolean verbose)

        Sprite Animation

        Creates an animation class

        Parameters:
        image - image from which the quads are taken.
        x - the x position to draw the animation.
        y - the y position to draw the animation.
        fps - how many animation frames to draw per second.
        frameCount - how many frames the animation comprises.
        framesWide - how many frames wide the image is
        framesHigh - how many frames high the image is
        looping - whether to loop the animation
        verbose - whether to output information

      • SpriteAnimation

        public SpriteAnimation(java.lang.String imageFilepath,
               int x,
               int y,
               int fps,
               int frameCount,
               int framesWide,
               int framesHigh,
               boolean looping,
               boolean verbose)

        Sprite Animation

        Creates an animation class

        Parameters:
        imageFilepath - the filepath at which the image is.
        x - the x position to draw the animation.
        y - the y position to draw the animation.
        fps - how many animation frames to draw per second.
        frameCount - how many frames the animation comprises.
        framesWide - how many frames wide the image is
        framesHigh - how many frames high the image is
        looping - whether to loop the animation
        verbose - whether to output information

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double dt)
        updates the timer and changes the frame if necessary
        Parameters:
        dt - time in seconds since last update

        draws the animation
